channel.description: Recent content in dual boot on The Duck Channel

item.title: How to Install Linux Mint Dual Boot with Windows 10
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Linux Mint with Windows 10 in Dual Boot. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Linux Mint ISO installation. You need install Windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! Links Linux Mint - Download Steps 1. Prepare Windows 10 I will shrink the disk space about 30 Gb to install Linux Mint.

item.title: How to Install Manjaro with Windows 10 Dual Boot
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Manjaro Linux with Windows Dual Boot. The boot mode in this case is EFI. I’m assuming you installed windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! Links Manjaro Site for Download Steps 1. Prepare the Bios Boot the PC and press the manufacturers key to open the BIOS. Common keys used: Esc, Delete, F1, F2, F9, F10, F11, or F12.
